alert.note: Alert for Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 20 at 10:43AM CST until January 22 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... Buffalo River Near Lobelville affecting Perry County. For the Buffalo River...including Lobelville, Flat Woods...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buffalo River Near Lobelville. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flood waters cover Route 438 south of Lobelville near Beardstown and it may be impassable. Extensive agricultural land along the river is flooded as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 11.7 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 15.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 445 AM CST.
